Everything Seungmin does is amazing! You were the best today! (expresses general admiration and praise)

LOVE_GENERAL.meaning_en: The youngest is the best! (The youngest is number one!)
Baby Bread (Cute Bread) - Referring to I.N being adorable

Let's get married! (Cute, with emojis)
Immediately proposing marriage! (Energetically)
I.N is my husband! (Declaration)
Marry me because the concert was so good it opened my eyes! (Nonsensical but passionate)

Missing I.N, the maknae on top!
Sick with missing baby I.N! (Lovesick)

PROMISE_FOREVER.meaning_en: I'll give you all the stars (always together)
Let's go on for a long time (together forever)
I'll take care of you (I'll always protect you) - *This can be interpreted as "My responsibility" in a cute, protective way.*
Let's take ì¸ìƒë„¤ì»· (life four-cut photo booth pictures) together (memories forever) - *A reference to the popular Korean photo booths.*

CONGRAT_BDAY.meaning_en: Our maknae on top! (Our youngest is the best!)
Fox, bang! (Referring to his fox likeness, "bang" signifies a surprise attack of cuteness/talent)
Baby bread, genius overflowing! (Referring to his nickname Baby Bread, celebrating his genius)
Lovable maknae (Endearing term for the youngest, used with affection.)
I.N style is the best! (Play on his name and the word "style", meaning he looks good.)

CHEER_UP.meaning_en: Maknae on Top! (The youngest is the best!)
Fox! (Cute!) - *referring to I.N's nickname as a desert fox*
Our maknae is the best!
Baby bread! (Cute cheeks) *referring to his chubby cheeks*
Life is Yang Jeongin! (Meaning of life)

PRAISE_GOD.meaning_en: The youngest is on top! (Referring to I.N's position as the youngest/maknae and his impressive talent.)
Yang Jeongin, worldwide handsome! (Playful praise of his looks using a common meme.)
Baby Bread, you got this! (Using his nickname "Baby Bread" and a fighting phrase.)
Puppy, the best! (Referring to him as a "puppy" - a common endearing term - and praising him.)
Born in 2001, is that for real?! (Expressing disbelief at how young and talented he is, common reaction to I.N's age.)

PRAISE_VISUAL.meaning_en: Baby on top! (Totally an angel!)
Bbanggeul I.N! (Sparkling/Dazzling I.N!)
His face is welfare! (So blessed!)
Baby Bread is the best! (Seriously precious!)
I.N-nyangie is squishy and adorable!

PRAISE_FACE.meaning_en: His face is welfare (His face is healing/beneficial to us)
The '04 line's visual is crazy! (Referring to his birth year & exceptional looks)
Just an idol from the heavens (Referring to his otherworldly beauty)
Prince material (He exudes prince-like vibes)
Sudden handsomeness (An unexpected and overwhelming burst of good looks)

REQ_HEART.meaning_en: The youngest is the best/rules all! (referring to I.N being a powerful youngest member)
Baby bread (affectionate nickname for I.N, implying he's cute and soft)
Puppy (another affectionate term, implying he's cute and playful)
Human Cotton Candy (implying he's sweet and fluffy)
Fox I.N (referring to his fox-like appearance and sometimes cunning personality)

HEALTH_EAT.meaning_en: Baby chick needs his food! (Playful way to say he needs to eat)
Our maknae ruling while munching! (Emphasizing him being the powerful youngest while eating)
Baby bread, have a yummy dinner! (Comparing him to baby bread, implying cuteness and urging him to eat well for dinner)
Fox I.N, gobble gobble! (Referring to his fox-like eyes & urging him to eat enthusiastically)
I.N, only walk the path of delicious food! (Wishing him a life full of good food and health.)

HEALTH_CARE.meaning_en: I.N, don't get sick-o! (Stay sweet and healthy like a mango!)
Baby Bread, you can't be sick! (It's not allowed for Baby Bread to be sick!) *Referring to I.N's cute nickname.*
I.N's health is fully equipped! (Always be healthy!)
